ticket.title: config.plugin_paths in specific environment configs fails
ticket.original-body:
I tried to put this line in test.rb, but the plugins in vendor/testing_plugins failed to load.
@@@ruby config.plugin_paths += %W[#{RAILS_ROOT}/vendor/testing_plugins] @@@
If I put this in environment.rb, the plugins in vendor/testing_plugins are added to the load path.
@@@ruby if RAILS_ENV == "test" # this doesn't work if it's in test.rb config.plugin_paths += %W[#{RAILS_ROOT}/vendor/testing_plugins] end @@@
